author: dreid
msg: The final stage of getting apache to build and run OK on BeOS.

author: dreid
msg: This change gets APR compiling on BeOS again.  Some filename changes
to accomodate having multiple common.c files.

author: rbb
msg: Add a new function to APR.  Basically, this opens an instance of the
platform's stderr and puts it into a ap_file_t structure.  I noticed
that we are ap_put_os_file(STDERR_FILENO...  a couple of places in the
Apache code.  This should make that much cleaner.  I am not convinced
it is portable, so it may disappear if it doesn't work, but I am

author: rbb
msg: Make APR compile on Windows again.  The changes that I introduced for
autoconf had the undesirable effect of killing the Windows build.
This still generates a few warnings, but at least it provides us with

author: bjh
msg: Clean out OS/2 version of APR misc library.
